mapper.select:
select (select tb_template_category.title from tb_template_category where tb_template_category.id = tb_template_statistics.category_id) as categoryName, sum(tb_template_statistics.visitor_count) visitorCount, sum(tb_template_statistics.used_count) usedCount from tb_template_statistics where 1=1
AND tb_template_statistics.gmt_create >= str_to_date(#{sTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND tb_template_statistics.gmt_create <= str_to_date(#{eTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by category_id order by category_id;
